name: Present the Group and plan ahead

description:
Details of the event:

http://www.flagey.be/en/program/15698/viaggio-in-italia/roberto-rossellini


Maybe afterwards we can have a get to know each other drink/cafe/juice/tea at Cafe Belga (next door) to discuss future plans and maybe look at a couple of programmes.

Hope to see as many of you as possible there.


Best. Nikos
name: Watch "Viaggio in Italia" by Roberto Rossellini

description:
Unmissable event!

Tickets can be bought at: http://www.bozar.be/activity.php?id=15198&selectiondate=2014-10-06

Afterwards we could all have a drink.
how_to_find_us: Meeting outside the main entrance at 19h30
name: Claudia Cardinale persents Il Gattopardo by L, Visconti

description:
Bonjour to all Filmians

Yesterday Mathilde, George, myself and some affiliates had a great evening at the screening on Il Gattopardi by Visconti. I am very happy I got my autograph.

Pls find attached two links, one with a Cardinale interview at the Guardian (2013): 

http://www.theguardian.com/film/2013/sep/11/claudia-cardinale-dont-want-stop 

and also

http://www.bfi.org.uk/news-opinion/news-bfi/features/leopard-celebrates-50th-anniversary


Julie suggested the Fellini expo in Ghent and here is a proposal for all of us to go there. I can provide a car that can accommodate 4 people.


http://www.caermersklooster.be/


Let me/us know and come on...

Best to all. 

Nikolaos (Nikos)
how_to_find_us: Pick up place somewhere in central Brussels
name: Fellini expo - Ghent Film Festival

description:
Hello Filmians

CINEMATEK is screening Jonas Meka's "Reminiscences of a journey to Lithuania" on Tuesday 11/11/14 at 21h00.

Jonas Mekas is a Lithuanian filmmaker, poet and artist who has often been called "the godfather of American avant-garde cinema." His work has been exhibited in museums and festivals world-wide.

More information on him and his work can be found at: 

http://jonasmekas.com/

Hope to see you all there.

Nikolaos (Nikos)


p.s. The Fellini expo journey was postponed. New date is Sunday 22 November; will be announced soon.
how_to_find_us: Meet 20h00 outside Cinematek for a quick drink before
name: CINEMATEK: "Reminiscences of a journey to Lithuania" by Jonas Mekas
